Selected Work

Genome Architecture → Partner Ready

Reframed complex biology into a partner-ready narrative; created a 30-account target list and secured 5 warm intros in 8 weeks.

Data→Outcome Playbook

Designed a decision-gate playbook connecting assay readouts to product milestones; reduced meeting churn by ~40%.

Grant→Commercial Bridge

Converted research grant outputs into BD assets; prepared 3 co-dev proposals.

About

I’ve spent 20+ years across Oxford, Cambridge, and industry translating molecular biology and computational genomics into strategy and partnerships. My style: Cambridge tempo, German reliability.
